snippet.title: Random Encounters # 11 - Car Race GP (Soundic Programmable)
snippet.description:
In this episode, I look at an ancient racing game and the system it came on, the oft-mentioned Soundic Programmable.

It's a game known by many names (but mostly as AY-3-8603-1) for a system known by many names (but mostly as SD050). Back in the 1970s, the home gaming industry was very different indeed...

---------------------------------------------------

What is 'Random Encounters'? Glad you asked. It's a series of modest videos in which I delve deep into my video game hoard with the assistance of a random number generator.
